title: The best new beauty products launching this October, from Fenty Beauty to Benefit
text:
Our beauty roundups are unbiased. On some occasions, we earn revenue if you click the links and buy the products, but we never allow this to affect our coverage.

Autumn is finally upon us and while October is a month typically associated with Halloween, pumpkin spiced lattes and the onset of darker days, for beauty buffs it is also a great opportunity to invest some of the countless beauty products that are beginning to hit the shelves.

This month, the beauty industry is brimming with exciting new launches, particularly when it comes to skincare.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

As the weather begins to cool down, the heating is getting hiked up high and so seasonal dryness is likely to become your number one skincare concern.

Luckily, new launches from Liz Earle, Glow Recipe and Caudalie have got you covered for the brisk weather that awaits with hydrating moisturisers, oils and overnight masks.

Perfume fans will be pleased to learn that there are also a number of new scents hitting shelves this month and they are just the kind of warming whiffs you need as autumn rolls in, including Malin + Goetz’s leather-infused offering and Tiffany’s floral fragrance.

Meanwhile, we predict that make-up mavens will barely be able to contain their excitement at the arrival of Christmas beauty launches.

From Fenty Beauty’s festive collection of lip glosses to Charlotte Tilbury’s party-ready palettes, it’s almost too hard to pick just one to spend your hard-earned cash on.

Click through the gallery above to see our favourite new-in beauty picks for October.
